title.rendered: Weekly Meal Plan for Highly Active Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 7

content.rendered:
In This Article

  • 1 Breakfast
  • 2 Lunch
  • 3 Snack
  • 4 Dinner

Breakfast

  • 1 Asparagus-Cheese Omelet (made with two whole eggs)
  • 1 cup Yogurt Parfait

Lunch

  • 1 serving Chicken & Spinach Soup with Fresh Pesto
  • 2 slices Whole-wheat Bread, toasted

Snack

  • 1 large Apple, sliced
  • 1 tablespoon natural Peanut Butter
  • 1 cup Tea/Coffee

Dinner

  • Chicken Pasta Primavera
  • 1 cup Garlic-Herb Tossed Broccoli

itemListElement.name: Weekly Meal Plan for Highly Active Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 7

@graph.name: Sharda Agarwal
@graph.description: Sharda Agarwal is a qualified Functional Nutrition Therapy Practitioner & a Certified Blood Chemistry Analyst. She first used dietary supplements to overcome a debilitating migraine she suffered for years. Since then she has studied the subjects of nutrition and nutrients extensively. She uses this to manage the health of her family at home and with Sepalika.
